item.title: Roblox: Da Hood Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Da Hood Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Da Hood
  • Da Hood Tips and Tricks
  • Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Da Hood
  • About the Da Hood Developers

Da Hood is inspired by the popular Grand Theft Auto series, with the developers also managing to implement the atmosphere of gangster blocks and constant shootings. In this article, Roblox players will find plenty of codes for Da Hood , which they can then redeem to get cash and buy good weapons.

Updated September 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Da Hood is giving you multiple chances to claim free in-game cash through codes. These rewards range from smaller boosts to large payouts that can help you gear up faster. It’s a simple way to build up your balance without extra effort. Keep an eye on future updates here so you don’t miss the next set of available rewards.

Da Hood Codes

  • freepremiumcrate - Redeem for a premium crate roll
  • easterdahood - Redeem for a free crate roll
  • Stars - Unknown Reward
  • DHUpdate - Unknown Reward

How to Redeem Codes in Da Hood

When it comes to redeeming codes in Da Hood , players just need to follow a few quick steps:

  1. Launch Da Hood
  2. Click on the Treasure Chest button on the bottom left of the screen
  3. Click inside the Enter Code Here box and paste the code
  4. Click Redeem to complete the process

Da Hood Tips and Tricks

To have a good time in the game, players need to have Da Hood Cash. To get Da Hood Cash, they can visit various stores, some of which will pay them for collecting shoes. Alternatively, players can use the above codes, which will provide them with a large amount of Da Hood Cash. In order to avoid feeling sad from the constant harassment of other gamers, players need to find and buy weapons, ammunition, and armor, which can be found in certain stores.

Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Da Hood

Although Da Hood is a fun game, there may come a time when it becomes boring. Often, in such cases, players look for alternatives. And to make it all easier for them, below is a list of the best games like Da Hood :

  • Ohio
  • Arsenal
  • East Brickton
  • Combat Warriors
  • Military Tycoon

About the Da Hood Developers

Da Hood developers are pretty productive, and their Da Hood Entertainment group has over 1 million members. They are also very active on their Discord server, where users can find many exciting things.

item.title: Warframe Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Warframe Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Warframe
  • Warframe Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe
  • About the Warframe Developers

Warframe is a free-to-play sci-fi action game. It actually feels like the developers worked really hard on the game, as they have thought of many features, including customization items. Below are plenty of Warframe codes for freebies as Glyphs skins and others.

Updated September 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Warframe currently has a wide set of active glyph codes that you can use for custom in-game designs. These glyphs let you personalize your profile with unique artwork from creators and partners. Since a new glyph was recently added, it’s worth keeping an eye out for more updates in the future. Make sure to redeem them while they remain active and check back later for additional releases.

Warframe Codes

Below, fans will find all the codes for Warframe, including a lot of Glyph codes. In the game, Glyphs are special images that players can use to personalize their profile or to distribute in the game. Glyphs can be placed on certain surfaces in the game, such as the walls of a player's base, or used as a profile picture.

Codes Checked on September 13, 2025.

How to Redeem Codes in Warframe

The process of redeeming codes is not as easy as one would expect since it is different from most other games. Therefore, if players have any difficulties, the step-by-step instructions below will help them:

  • First, visit the official promo code page on the Warframe website.
  • Then, players need to log in to their Warframe account.
  • Afterward, they should enter or copy the above-mentioned code in the Promo Code field.
  • To redeem the code, click the Submit Code button.

Warframe Tips and Tricks

  • Platinum Strategy: Invest the initial 50 platinum wisely, focusing on weapon and Warframe slots for efficient gear management.
  • Mastery Rank: Increase Mastery Rank by leveling gear and completing Mastery Tests.
  • Star Chart Priority: Systematically conquer Star Chart missions before venturing into open-world areas for better rewards later on.
  • Trading Tactics: Engage in trading when a platinum discount is available, and rely on Warframe Market for fair transactions, avoiding trade chat as a beginner.
  • Nightwave Rewards: Participate in Nightwave challenges for valuable items and rank advancement.
  • Syndicate Support: Join syndicates for passive reputation gains and rewards.
  • Endo Management: Spend Endo wisely, choosing essential mods over others.
  • Premium Assistance: Consider premium boosts for faster progression, especially if time is limited.

The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe

Shooters have proven to be very diverse, from fantasy to classics like Counter-Strike , for example. For those looking to expand their gaming experience, this article will provide five enjoyable and addictive shooters like Warframe .

  • Paladins
  • Payday 2
  • Warface
  • Apex Legends
  • Overwatch 2

About the Warframe Developers

Warframe was created by the developers from Digital Extremes. This Canadian team has been making games since 1993 and has more than 200 workers. Here are some of their titles:

  • Unreal Tournament
  • Epic Pinball
  • Dark Sector
  • The Darkness II
  • Soulframe

item.title: Top Heroes Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
In Top Heroes , players will have to assemble a team of brave heroes and go fight the forces of evil. However, in addition to exploring new locations, you need to develop your base by building new structures and upgrading them. This requires investing quite a lot of resources. To get them faster, you should use Top Heroes codes.

Each of these codes can reward you with a number of useful items, including Recruit Vouchers and Resource Chests. But as always, their validity is limited. Therefore, if you do not want to miss out on free goodies, you should hurry to use the codes.

Updated September 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Top Heroes has several active codes you can use to claim a mix of rewards. The latest addition offers another way to stock up on helpful items, including resources and recruitment tokens. These codes provide a good balance of boosts, from Diamonds to chests and vouchers, giving you a steady supply of useful materials. Make sure to keep an eye out for future updates, as more codes may be released over time.

All Top Heroes Codes

Working Top Heroes Codes

  • 753D7CED02 - Redeem this code to get rewards. (NEW)
  • C8BEE70E72 - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • 37F4178F6 - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • THJP2025 - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • THKR2025 - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • 2025TOPHEROES - Redeem this code to get 2 Recruitment Tokens, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Ruby Chests and 5 Level-tied Meat Chests.
  • TopHeroes2025 - Redeem this code to get 2 Recruitment Tokens, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Ruby Chests and 5 Level-tied Meat Chests.
  • Im1of200k - Redeem this code to get 10 Recruitment Tokens, 10 Universal Speed-ups (15m), and 10 Level-tied Meat Chests.
  • TH777 - Redeem this code to get 300 Diamonds and 3 Recruit Vouchers.
  • Im1of100k - Redeem this code to get 5 Meat Chests, 5 Recruit Vouchers, and 5 Universal Speed-ups for 15 min.

Expired Top Heroes Codes

  • CoolfortheSummer
  • F4F45E1A
  • 40DF56377
  • 8A4F88D93E
  • B8C45ED498
  • 424723F4E
  • 3F6F2BB79
  • 262EE1C3
  • TasteTheFun
  • 32DB1852
  • 3E765170C
  • 68ADC86F38
  • 7547ED26
  • EEA9F46471
  • 64843E97
  • DCE25993
  • EggcellentTH
  • A8E29737F
  • SerpentTH
  • MistletoETH
  • THSnowMan
  • JingleBellSTH
  • 2024TOPHEROES
  • TopHeroes2024
  • HarvestSeason
  • SpookyTH
  • TopHeroesLive
  • CakeTime
  • ONEYEARTH
  • WATERFIGHT
  • YUMYUM
  • NANOJOURNEY
  • NewAdventure
  • CherryBlossom
  • MistletoeTH
  • SummerinTH
  • 2024TOPHEROES
  • KZ4QOGCZX5
  • EXPLORER
  • Eggcellent
  • ImYours
  • Abracadabra

As befits the RPG genre, all resources can be found while exploring locations. Some of them drop from defeated enemies, while others are obtained by chopping down trees and mining rocks. However, this process takes quite a long time. Fortunately, there is a way to save time and get many resources and other useful items, namely using Top Heroes codes.

Just a few Top Heroes codes will help you summon new characters, as well as get enough resources to upgrade buildings. However, it is important to note that after the code expires, the rewards are no longer available. Therefore, we recommend that you redeem Top Heroes codes as soon as possible, especially considering that it is quite easy to do.

How to Redeem Top Heroes Codes

Just like with Roblox codes, the rewards for using Top Heroes codes are quite valuable. In addition, the codes feature is available almost from the very beginning of the game. So, you just need to follow these steps to get your goodies:

  • Launch Top Heroes.
  • Follow the short tutorial.
  • Then, click on your profile icon in the upper left corner of the screen and go to settings.
  • After that, click on the Redeem Gift Code option.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Confirm button to get the rewards.

How to Get More Top Heroes Codes

As is the case with many other free mobile games, the developers release new codes for Top Heroes quite often. So, you should visit the official social media of the game. There, you will find not only new codes but also news about updates and events:

  • Top Heroes Facebook page
  • Top Heroes Discord server

Top Heroes is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Silksong: How to Get the Curvesickle Tool
item.description:
Tools in Hollow Knight: Silksong are designed so that they can be useful in every situation and encounter. This means that players will have to switch out tools depending on whether they are simply exploring the map or fighting a boss.

Dealing with the annoying flying enemies can be quite hard, but thankfully, the Curvesickle solves that problem. This guide offers information on the location of the Tool as well as the previous requirements players will need to complete in Hollow Knight: Silksong .

How to Get the Curvesickle Tool in Silksong

Meeting the Requirements

To acquire the Curvesickle Tool, there are two requirements you have to meet first. The first requirement is to acquire the Curveclaw Tool. This tool is located inside the Hunter’s March . To reach Hunter’s March, you need to go to the Marrow and go to the top right section, where a path above, where you free Grindle from his cell, leads to an Ant Guardian. This boss fight is extremely difficult, especially if you do not already have the dash ability. With the ability, you can simply dash in and out after attacks. After the fight, make your way to the right, where you will meet Shakra for the map, and you can go up to find a Bench.

Be careful when sitting on the bench as it is trapped. You can go left of the bench to activate a lever, which makes it so that you will not lose any health when sitting on it.

Head up from the bench area, you can go through the passage on the left to find Mottled Skarr , who is an NPC selling a few items, one of which is the tool you need.

In the case that you arrive at the NPC's location in the second or third act of the game, players will find the NPC dead. However, there is another way to acquire the Tool which will not cost you any Rosaries . Head out of the room and go up to find another passage on your left . Here you will find the same Ant Guardian alongside a flying enemy. Deal with both of these enemies and head left to find the Curveclaw .

The second requirement is to reach the third act in the game, which might take players quite a bit of time, as it involves completing all the wishes, gaining access to Bellhome , and finding all the Fleas .

Acquiring the Curvesickle in Act 3

Go to the Far Fields Bellway Station and go up the air stream. To your right, you can enter a room with a target out front. Here you will find four targets hanging and a non-hostile enemy who will disappear upon seeing you. With the Curveclaw Tool equipped, position yourself in a way that when you use it, you can hit all four of them at the same time . Once you do that, the enemy will come out and request the tool. Give it to him, leave, and go rest at a bench . Come back after that, and you will find the Curvesickle lying on the ground for your taking.

What Does the Curvesickle Do in Silksong?

The Curvesickle is basically an upgraded version of your Curveclaw. It has a wider range and is a much better option overall. Since acquiring the upgraded tool does not require any Rosaries or difficult platforming sections, the Curvesickle is a must for players who have the Curveclaw as their equipped Tool and use it to deal with the annoying flying enemies. Using it is the same as the smaller version as well.

item.title: Cookie Run Kingdom Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Cookie Run Kingdom Codes
  • Cookie Run Kingdom Social Media
  • How to Redeem Codes in Cookie Run Kingdom

While not required for gameplay, Cookie Run Kingdom has offered many different special codes to help players with their gacha pulls. These codes can be found on various official social media pages such as Twitter and YouTube.

Updated September 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Cookie Run: Kingdom currently has a code that grants you a mix of useful in-game rewards, including crystals and other premium items. These rewards can give you a solid boost for progressing and customizing your experience. If you’re looking to strengthen your team, this is a good time to take advantage of it. Keep an eye out for future updates, as more rewards may become available later.

All Cookie Run Kingdom Codes

Active Cookie Run Kingdom Codes

  • MISSEARTHBREAD25 - (3,000 Crystals, 1,500 Rainbow Cubes, 1,500 Choco Chalk) (NEW)

  • CRK2NDBIRTHDAYD7 (3 Special Cookie Cutters)

Cookie Run Kingdom Social Media

There are multiple English social media accounts owned by the Cookie Run Kingdom staff. By following these accounts, players will be able to discover new redeemable codes when they are first released to the public. Some of these accounts are:

CRKingdomEN - Twitter

Cookie Run: Kingdom - YouTube

CRKingdomEN - Facebook

CookieRunKingdom - Instagram

CookieRun_En - TikTok

How to Redeem Codes in Cookie Run Kingdom

It is important to know that publicly released codes can only be used once per DevPlay account and cannot be endlessly used in one kingdom.

For the majority of players, the coupon redemption screen can be found by first entering the menu in the top right corner of the screen while outside of battle. In this menu, select the Coupons button to open up the web browser to the redemption screen.

Players who do not have the option to go directly to the redemption screen from in-game can still enter it by going to this website.

In order to enter a code, players need to have both a code and the name of their DevPlay account. Players can find the name of their DevPlay account by going into Cookie Run Kingdom 's Settings menu. From here, the name of the DevPlay account being used at the time can be found in the upper left corner of the Info tab. If the DevPlay account is an email address, the entire email address needs to be entered on the code redemption screen.

Once the process is complete, rewards will be received in the Mailbox and players can claim them right away.

The secrets of the ancient Cookies and their kingdoms are waiting to be unraveled. Join GingerBrave and his friends against Dark Enchantress Cookie and her dark legion. The chronicles of CookieRun: Kingdom have just begun!

Create the ultimate Cookie team with endless combinations of Treasures and Toppings. Prove your battle skill in the Kingdom Arena, Cookie Alliance, Super Mayhem, and Guild Battles! Come up with different strategies to emerge victorious!

Reach the top of the ranking table with your fellow guildmates. Expand your guild's Domain and collect Guild Relics to become the strongest guild there is!
